purpose.para: Returns the iterator pointing to the i-th element of the MetaObjectSequence. The Position parameter must be an instantiation of mpl::int_.

section.title: Examples
section.programlisting: typedef ::std::pair< bool, double> P; BOOST_CHECK(( deref< point_to< BOOST_MIRRORED_CLASS(P)::attributes, mpl::int_<0> >::type >::type::base_name() == at< BOOST_MIRRORED_CLASS(P)::attributes, mpl::int_<0> >::type::base_name() )); BOOST_CHECK(( deref< point_to< BOOST_MIRRORED_CLASS(P)::all_attributes, mpl::int_<1> >::type >::type::base_name() == at< BOOST_MIRRORED_CLASS(P)::all_attributes, mpl::int_<1> >::type::base_name() ));

typedef ::std::pair< bool, double> P; BOOST_CHECK(( deref< point_to< BOOST_MIRRORED_CLASS(P)::attributes, mpl::int_<0> >::type >::type::base_name() == BOOST_CTS_LIT("first") )); BOOST_CHECK(( deref< point_to< BOOST_MIRRORED_CLASS(P)::attributes, mpl::int_<1> >::type >::type::base_name() == BOOST_CTS_LIT("second") ));

typedef ::std::pair< bool, double> P; BOOST_MPL_ASSERT(( iterator_equal< point_to< BOOST_MIRRORED_CLASS(P)::attributes, mpl::int_<0> >::type, begin< BOOST_MIRRORED_CLASS(P)::attributes >::type > )); BOOST_MPL_ASSERT(( iterator_not_equal< point_to< BOOST_MIRRORED_CLASS(P)::all_attributes, mpl::int_<1> >::type, begin< BOOST_MIRRORED_CLASS(P)::all_attributes >::type > ));
